content: I get what you're saying, but I don't think we should be censoring humor just because it might offend a small group of people. Comedy is supposed to be edgy and push boundaries. If we keep trying to cater to everyone's sensitivities, we'll never be able to make any progress as a society. It's important to have shows like Family Guy that aren't afraid to ruffle a few feathers and get people thinking outside of their comfort zones.
